content: spoil a newborn with this beautiful **deluxe baby blanket** 1 it is crocheted in sultan deluxe which is a yarn in 100% soft cotton available in fabulous color combinations it has a gorgeous shell pattern which gives the blanket a wonderful look happy crocheting materials - crochet hook e 3 5mm - 1 skein sultan deluxe finished size approx 28 x 28 abbreviations **chain** chain **st** stitch **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/deluxe-baby-blanket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=deluxe-baby-blanket&utm_term=swr
